channel.title: Need help here
channel.description:
hi every1 i was looking at some scripts but i got freakt out :p i was wondering.. if some1 could make a script that simply clicks these cordinates so that the mouse smoothly moves to the cordinate n click.. is that possible?? i would be verry greatfull
277,387 wait(300) 255,454 wait(300) 292,451 wait(300) 250,404 wait(300) 243,452 wait(300) 243,452 wait(300)
these are the cordinates n waits.. i hope some1 will help me..

item.title: Need help here
item.dc:creator: @Black_pk Black pk
item.description:
@Black_pk wrote:

[quote=“tjapzor, post:1, topic:148695”]hi every1 i was looking at some scripts but i got freakt out
i was wondering… if some1 could make a script that simply clicks these cordinates so that the mouse smoothly moves to the cordinate n click…
is that possible?? i would be verry greatfull

277,387
wait(300)
255,454
wait(300)
292,451
wait(300)
250,404
wait(300)
243,452
wait(300)
243,452
wait(300)

these are the cordinates n waits… i hope some1 will help me…[/quote]

Like this? Also to make it right click insted of true, put false. Finally maybe you want to set your wait time to 1000 = 1 sec. and yours is going 1/3 of a sec. otherwise it will mess up.

clickmouse(277,387,true);
wait(300)
clickmouse(255,454,true);
wait(300)
clickmouse(292,451,true);
wait(300)
clickmouse(250,404,true);
wait(300)
clickmouse(243,452,true);
wait(300)
Clickmouse(243,452,true);
wait(300)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help here
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

Wewt, i managed to remember how to do one thing

Hopefully you’ll be pleased!

Program Clicky;
  //////////////////////////////////
 //Made by Jei jei KK for tjapzor//
//////////////////////////////////
const
timestorepeat=2;

var
number:integer;
procedure Clickme;
begin
  MoveMouseSmooth(277,387)
  ClickMouse(277,387,true)
 wait(300)
  MoveMouseSmooth(255,454)
  ClickMouse(255,454,true)
 wait(300)
  MoveMouseSmooth(292,451)
  ClickMouse(292,451,true)
 wait(300)
  MoveMouseSmooth(250,404)
  ClickMouse(250,404,true)
 wait(300)
  MoveMouseSmooth(243,452)
  ClickMouse(250,404,true)
 wait(300)
  MoveMouseSmooth(243,452)
  ClickMouse(250,404,true)
 wait(300)
number:= number+1;
end;








begin
repeat
clickme;
until(number=timestorepeat)
end.

Read full topic
